item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Paul McCartney - Press (US 12") (1986) 24 Bit/96 kHz
item.description:
​


Artist: Paul McCartney
Title: Press
Year Of Release: 1986
Label: Capitol Records [V-15235]
Genre: Pop, Rock
Quality: FLAC (*tracks) 24 Bit/96 kHz
Total Time: 00:22:16
Total Size: 454 mb (+3%rec.)

https://www.discogs.com/ru/release/2175458-Paul-McCartney-No-More-Lonely-Nights

In July 1986, Paul McCartney returned to the pop charts with “Press”, the lead single from his sixth solo studio album, Press to Play. Released on July 14, 1986, the song marked a distinct step into mid-80s production for McCartney, pairing his classic songwriting style with glossy, synth-driven textures and a bright pop sheen.


Tracks:

SIDE A:
Press (Video Soundtrack) 4:44
It’s Not True 5:47

SIDE B:
Hanglide 5:16
Press (Dub Mix) 6:29
